name: MicroMan X: Escape the Factory
description:
Walk with Arrow Keys

Jump with Up Key

Shoot with Space Bar (hold for charge shot)

Submission for Trijam #57: Factory.
Unfortunately, this game took me closer to 4 hours to code =( but it was one hell of a fun challenge!!

Rainy-James came thru with the music and sprites (3Hrs of work)!

Excited for the next Trijam!
